parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Eden Editor

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> When useOffset is [[true]], camera will move to the position + defined offset in config and '''target''' the position. If useOffset is false, the camera will be moved exactly to the provided position without changing the rotation of the camera. Default camera offset: <tt>[0,-25,25]</tt>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''move3DENCamera''' [position,useOffset]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> position: [[Position]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> useOffset: [[Boolean]] - true if camera should use offset (defined in [[configFile]] >> "Cfg3DEN" >> "Camera" >> "moveOffset")

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[move3DENCamera]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[getPos]] [[player]],true];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>
